meanings: [명사] excuse (for), justification (for), pretext (for), [동사] explain oneself, justify (oneself), make[give] an excuse (for)
have not a leg to stand on

vlive.korean: [변명 생각 중] - 뭐... - 아 이게 사장의 마음인가? [Thinking about what to say] - Well... - Is that all up to the owner? 듣기 View video Dingo Freestyle / 딩고프리스타일 : VMC 사장 딥플로우, 이제 떡볶이 사업 시작?? | 아마두 순위 공약 #1ㅣ둘도 없는 힙합 친구 : 다모임ㅣDingo Freestyle
vlive.english: [Thinking about what to say] - Well... - Is that all up to the owner?

examples.korean: There is no excuse for sloppiness in your work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일을 대충 하는 데 대해서는 변명의 여지가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is no excuse for sloppiness in your work. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She walked along rehearsing her excuse for being late. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 늦은 데 대해 변명할 말을 연습하며 걸어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She walked along rehearsing her excuse for being late. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He pleaded family problems for his lack of concentration. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 집안 문제 때문에 집중을 할 수 없다고 변명했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He pleaded family problems for his lack of concentration. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She concocted some elaborate story to explain her absence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 결근한 것을 변명하기 위해 상당히 정교한 이야기를 지어내었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She concocted some elaborate story to explain her absence. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She served up the usual excuse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 늘 하는 변명을 늘어놓았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She served up the usual excuse. Add to Wordbook
